name: Eggou
description:
Eggou, Bullet Hell with eggs. "EGG HELL"

In the year 2XXX, robo-chicken.3000 threatens the New Zealand chicken coop. Will you be able to eliminate robo-chiken.3000?

This is a Newgrounds July Jam Sumbission. Try in (with medals and scoreboards)

Controls: Wasd or Arrows for move, and space for shoot.
Complete gameplay: https://youtu.be/bJUrsARd7b4

Special thanks to: MA2, NG July Jam Server, @Pomegranite, @SodaMindReader @IsPolar and you.
